name: uncaught
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not found and stopped or dealt with: Her killer remains uncaught. There is a risk that serious health problems will go uncaught and untreated.
More examplesFewer examplesThere have long been suspicions about uncaught accomplices.Several articles criticized the police for their incompetence in leaving him uncaught for so long. Recorded crime has gone on rising, and more criminals are getting away uncaught. This is the rate at which uncaught fish migrate out of the unit, and so are unavailable for catching at a later date.
